proposal: Diving into Project X, it's like turning your social savvy into a revenue stream - talk about earning while you chill! 🛋️ With 71 holders on the ETH network, congrats on building a community that's all about leveraging their voice. How about we add a twist? Imagine deploying your own DEX or hosting a community lottery, where every post could be more than just points. Let's make your campaigns the talk of the town, without complicating things.
